snippet.title: Foundation Launch Trailer | 1.0 Out Now!
snippet.description:
Foundation combines free-building tools and procedural generation to create the ultimate gridless medieval city-building experience. 

Limited Time Offer: Save 25% with our Launch Discount!

Buy Now on Steam: https://bit.ly/Foundation_Steam
Buy Now on GOG: https://bit.ly/Foundation_GOG

🎮 Play new and improved features including: Housing, Trade, Fortifications and Patrols
🏰 Build new monuments such as the Castle!
🖼️ Take a look at the new Environment
🖥️ Play with a vastly improved UI
And much more!

Music by: Audinity

#Foundation #Medieval #Gridless #Citybuilder #PCGaming #Games #Gaming #GameTrailers

For more news and information about Foundation:
Discord: https://discord.gg/foundation
Website: https://www.polymorph.games
X: https://x.com/foundationgame
BlueSky: https://bsky.app/profile/foundationgame.bsky.social
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/@foundationgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/polymorphgamesofficial
